data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Module::Test extends the philosophy of Module::Install to testing.
    M::I lets you refactor and reuse Makefile.PL magics. M::T lets you
    do the same for t/ juju. This will allow one to move beyond thinking
    of only Test::More primitives and on to larger grained abstractions.
